item.title: This right? lol
item.dc:creator: @Ixl_Adds_Ixl Ixl Adds Ixl
item.description:
@Ixl_Adds_Ixl wrote:

never mind it works…had a error going on r0fl

Erm…wrote it using arrays & integers.

[code=java]class IxlAddsIxl {

    public static void main(String[] args) {

String[][] names = {{"Mr. ", "Mrs. ", "Ms. "},
                    {"iExcel", "Bitcher"}};

System.out.println(names[0][0]+names[1][0]+" wants to fuck");
System.out.println("but "+names[0][2]+names[1][1]+" doesn't");
System.out.println("Soooo... Who will fuck?");
}

}[/code]

it suppose to print:
Mr. iExcel wants to fuck
but Ms. Bitcher doesn’t
Soooo… Who will fuck?

Read full topic
